comments:

By inspecting the IconService code, I think this particular NPE can only happen if the icon provider class (in the iconProviders XML extension) can't be instantiated.

I was able to reproduce the problem on the Geoshapes example by creating an icon provider with a provider class that doesn't exist.  Note that in this case the error log also includes the entry "Plug-in X was unable to load class Y".

I will make the IconService robust enough to handle this scenario.
Fixed.  Added protection code in the IconService to gracefully handle the case when the icon provider class can't be instantiated (e.g., the class specified in XML doesn't exist).
